You feel yourself flying through the air at a tremendous speed. If it hadn't had been for the milkshake machine being turned on, you would probably have been killed.
You splash as you land hard in the slushy milkshake and go under immediately. Fighting for your breath, you manage to reach the surface and swim to the side, where you grab onto the side and pull yourself out.
There you collapse in a heap on the side of the container of milkshake, as you fight for your breath. You can voices from beyond the counter, it must be Justin.
"Yuk! Oh man! You call that a burger?"
"Hey I must have under-cooked it or something"
"You're telling me! I nearly choked!"
You then realize that you have been saved by a dodgy burger! You listen as you hear Justin and Bryan continue arguing.
"No way! I'm so out of here!"
"Wait Justin! Let me try again!"
"What so you can try and poison me again? No thanks, man! I'm leaving!"
You watch as you see Justin grab his things and walk out of the restaurant.
Bryan slams his huge fist on the table and curses out loud. He walks out through the door after Justin.
Lying there, you slowly begin to get up and wipe the rest of the milkshake from your tiny body.
Now you can finally get out of this restaurant.
There is the front door and there is the back door.
Wonder which way would be the best?
1511221121111221.title: Im "Not" lovin It!

15112211211112212.content:
You have had quite enough of the giants contact for one day, so you decide going out the back door would be a better option.
You manage to reach the end of the counter and see a large bag of rubbish below you. It isn't a big drop but still its quite a fall.
As you look around, you notice the back door is ajar from when Justin and Ashton came through. So you can go out through that door.
With a deep breath, you hold your hands behind you and throw yourself forward. You fall down and land with a bump in the bag.
The rotting smell of raw food fills your nostrils as you manage to reach the top of the bag and climb down onto the kitchen floor.
You look forward and see the open door in front of you. Walking over you hear the sound of movement coming from the outside.
As you get closer, you hear that its voices.
You reach the door and look around the corner to see three enormous giants talking in a large alley. Looking closer you see that the three are people you have seen off television!
To the right of you is r'n'b star and singer, Romeo! He is wearing jet black pants with a red jacket and white shirt underneath.
In the middle is actor and heart throb star, Orlando Bloom! He is standing there with dark blue pants and a cream t-shirt on.
Before you get a chance to see the other giant, he turns and walks down the alley and turns the bend out of sight.
Both the giants are still chatting and are handing each other pieces of paper. They must be making a movie of some sort.
You quietly walk besides the huge black bins and look ahead. You see the stars both have bags with them besides their feet. Walking down the alley could take a while, so why not hitch a ride with one of the giants?
You glance around and they are still in deep conversation.
Make your choice quick!
15112211211112212.title: Three's a Crowd.

choices: Climb out of the Bag and explore the Airport.
Get out of the Bag and make your way to Romeo.
151122112111122121.content:
As you look that little bit closer, you see that Romeo's bag is a little closer to you, so you decide to take a chance on him.
You make a dash to his bag and clamber up the side and fall down into the inside.
Deep in the bag, you see all kinds of things from a huge bottle of mineral water, to a load of cd's piled high at the side of you. You pick yourself up and take a look around. There dosen't look like there is anything edible, which is a real shame as you're very hungry.
Suddenly the bag shakes and you fall to the side. Romeo has started to pick up the bag and you are on the move, it seems.
As you bounce along, you see the cd's and that large bottle shake and bang all around the bag.
You just hope you don't get crushed by anything.
Romeo continues walking along and you have no idea where he is going to.
Maybe back to his apartment or house?
Or maybe he's going making a new video?
You ponder these thoughts as you bounce along in his bag.
After about ten minutes, the bouncing stops. You stay still for a moment and all is quiet.
Suddenly a bright beam of light fills the inside of the bag as a gigantic hand comes in and lifts the big bottle of water from the bag.
You look up to see Romeo unscrew the cap and take a big gulp of water and watch him swallow it down.
He puts the top back on and drops it back into the bag, just missing you by an inch.
With the bag zipped back up, its dark again.
You now bouncing along again but you can hear ringing.
It's Romeo's phone and you hear him answer it.
"Hey, hows it hanging?"
You hear a lot of laughter from the giant singer, then you stomach turns as you hear where abouts he is heading next.
"Oh yeah man, my flight's in about half an hour, yeah"
The Airport!
The bag will be searched and you will be discovered.
You instantly go into panic mode as you hear Romeo handing his bag to someone. You are thrown to the side and hear a loud buzzing noise. Then you hear another voice.
"Welcome Sir. Your flight is waiting"
You're at the airport!
You jump up an manage to stick you head out of the side pocket of the bag and see Romeo passing something to someone else.
You've got to act fast!
What should you do?
151122112111122121.title: Where For Out Thou Romeo?

choices: Jump out of the Case and attempt to get down off the Belt.
Stay in the safety of the Case and see where Orlando is going.
1511221121111221211.content:
You want to get away from Romeo's bag as quick as you can so you climb out and drop to the floor.
You watch the gigantic trainers of Romeo begin to move away from you, which seems like the ground is shaking.
Desparate and scared, you dash to a bin at the corner of a wall and hide behind it.
There are a huge amount of giant feet thundering past you and you conclude that trying to get out of here on the ground would be instant death.
You look up and see that you are next to a luggage carousel and that there are suitcases above you moving along it.
Maybe if you could get onto the conveyor belt, you could reach a suitcase. Then you would at least be out of the Airport!
You start to climb up the bin, via the plastic bag hanging out of it, and manage to reach the lid. There, you jump up and grab hold of something going past.
You're swept along hanging onto the strap of a case. As you look down, you see the tiles on the floor zooming past.
You quickly manage to pull yourself up and robe climb up the strap until you are on top of the case.
You instantly fall as the case is moving quite fast. Being on her might not be such a good idea, if you don't want to be seen so you pull the large zip from the side pocket of the case and it opens slightly.
As you dive in, you manage to keep it a little bit open so you can see ahead of you.
There is someone waiting for a case coming up close but you cant quite make it out.
Then as he comes into focus, you suddenly get a moment of past memory.
It's Orlando Bloom!
His hands are spread out wide ready to grab the case.
There's still time to get out!
1511221121111221211.title: From One to the Other.

choices: Go through the Door to the Garden.
15112211211112212112.content:
Staying in the case might be safer than getting on the conveyor belt, as it is moving quite fast.
You look to see that you getting closer to Orlando as he prepares to grab the case from the moving carousel.
There's a bump as you are thrown deep down to the inner parts of the case. Orlando must have picked up his case.
You remain still for a movement then you feel like your in motion but not bumping.
Little do you know, but Orlando is wheeling the case away where he is heading toward the Airport exit.
You are sat in the dark deep parts of the inner case and begin to wonder where you are heading this time.
There is not a lot of noise coming from outside as you stand up and put your ear to the side of the case.
Roughly ten minutes later, there's a loud bump and you fall down deeper into the case.
Luckly the clothes broke your fall and you manage to get yourself back on your feet.
You hear a door bang and all is quiet.
You stay silent yourself as you listen for any movement from Orlando.
Then there is the noise of the case zipping undone and you begin to try and find a way out.
Frantically, you manage to find a small hole where the stitching has come loose and you squeeze through it, where you leap to the floor below.
You're in Orlando's apartment!
You instantly run to the nearest object to you.
A water cooler. You hide behind the cooler and watch as you see the gigantic giant unzips the case and begin to move his clothes around and take things out.
Maybe you had better find somewhere safer for the time being?
Or maybe you want to explore Orlando's apartment while he's busy?
You look around to see the next room in the house is the kitchen.
As you look the other way, you see that a door leading to the garden is wide open.
Which way do you want to go?
15112211211112212112.title: Home Sweet Home?

152.content:
Thankfully you are already close to the reception area as you passed it on your wanders.
You turn back and enter the reception area under the doors.
You hear a voice from behind the desk.
"i suggest you try the sauna, the swimming pool and the tanning room during your stay, thank you."
There before you are Zachery Ty Bryan and Jonathan Taylor Thomas both are reaching in their pockets for money and you have time to reach both of them.
Zach's wearing sandles with little grooves on the bases so they're easy to climb, while Jonathan's pants which are quite baggy are slightly ripped on the bottom with lots of loose strands so now is your option to climb to both of them.
Which will it be?
152.title: Reception

info.brief_description: a newer and hopefully more active version of shrinking at celeb swimming etc.

This story is another shrinking with male stars story but in order to add more stars i need your help...
please view the sister item in my portfolio called shrinking with male stars it has a quiz that i would like quickly done in order to add storys the people who read this want
========================
storylines in preparation and coming soon:

Enrique iglesias
